original: intros d t H. split. - intros Hr. destruct d as [p a]. simpl in *. apply rec_nonco_kill with (a0 := a). + apply rec_co with (a := a); auto. + apply rec_co_rec. apply rec_co_rec_def_0. apply rec_co_def_0. apply rec_co_5 with (a0 := a); auto. - intros Hr. destruct d as [p a]. simpl in *. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_dir. + apply H. + auto.
